wikipedia_page.main: Mick Chatterton (born 26 March 1940) is a former Grand Prix motorcycle road racer. His best season was in 1969 when he finished the year in 16th place in the 250cc world championship. His last TT race was the 2004 lightweight 125.

link_mentions.page: List of Grand Prix motorcycle racers: C

response: "The Fastest Lap: A Tribute to Peter Middleton" is scheduled to be released in 2022. The film is being directed by Middleton's son, Pete Middleton and features several interviews including world championship riders, John Cooper and Mick Chatterton.
